shared.model.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.player.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Player>, IPlayer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIPlayer

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPlayer, java.lang.Comparable<Player>
    Representation of a player in the game - Super class for User Players and AI Players
    Author:
    Kyle Cornelison
